name: Garbage Classification Simulator 垃圾分类模拟器
name_original: Garbage Classification Simulator 垃圾分类模拟器
description:
Garbage Classification Simulator is a simulator-like game that provides players with knowledge of Garbage Classification through slightly humorous elements and levels.

The game also has RPG elements for players to improve their character's attributes and abilities. In addition to the rich mechanics and levels, there's more to explore than it shows in the graphics and descriptions.
